ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.MISSION_CONTENT: At TeutaSteel, our mission is to provide reliable and superior steel solutions tailored to the unique needs of our clients. Whether you’re looking for structural steel, pipes, or custom-made steel components, we deliver products that exceed industry standards and ensure long-lasting performance.

OFFER_LIST.PIPES: Galvanized Steel Pipes: Available in a wide range of dimensions and thicknesses, suitable for industrial, commercial, and residential applications.
OFFER_LIST.SHEETS: Steel Sheets: High-quality sheets designed for various construction and manufacturing purposes, offering durability and corrosion resistance.
OFFER_LIST.CUSTOM_SOLUTIONS: Custom Solutions: We offer custom steel solutions tailored to your exact specifications.

VALUES_LIST.QUALITY_FIRST: Quality First: We believe that quality is the foundation of our success. Each product undergoes rigorous testing to ensure it meets the highest standards.
VALUES_LIST.CUSTOMER_FOCUS: Customer Focus: We strive to build long-term relationships with our customers by providing exceptional service and support.
VALUES_LIST.SUSTAINABILITY: Sustainability: TeutaSteel is committed to sustainable practices, including responsible sourcing of materials and minimizing our environmental impact.

WHY_US_LIST.EXPERTISE: Expertise: With years of experience in the steel industry, our team is equipped with the knowledge and expertise to meet your needs.
WHY_US_LIST.INNOVATION: Innovation: We continuously invest in cutting-edge technology and processes to stay at the forefront of the industry.
WHY_US_LIST.DELIVERY: Reliable Delivery: We understand the importance of timely delivery. TeutaSteel ensures that your products are delivered on time, every time.

HOME.HERO_SUBTITLE: High-quality galvanized steel products for every need
HOME.TESTIMONIAL_1_TEXT: "TeutaSteel provides top-notch galvanized steel. We've used their products for years and are very satisfied."
HOME.CTA_TITLE: Ready to Order Your Steel Products?
HOME.CTA_TEXT: Contact us today to get a quote or learn more about our products and services.
